description: Values returned by Caddy Frontend instanciation

domain.description: Base domain used by the instance

log-access-url.description: List of URLs to access logs

public-ipv4.description: Public IPv4 to be included on DNS

replication_number.description: Number of nodes the slave is replicated

request-error-list.description: In case if slave has been rejected by master or has error in the request, the list contains information about each problem
